summary: Encapsulates the end‑to‑end workflow for the Kandinsky‑3 text‑to‑image model, handling initialization, configuration loading and pretrained model retrieval, and exposing a ready‑to‑use pipeline for generating images.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly integrate Kandinsky‑3 image synthesis capabilities into applications by providing a high‑level, plug‑and‑play pipeline that abstracts model loading and setup.
